explains: n. （汽车等的）挡泥板；防卫物；（暖炉的）炉围；（船只的）碰垫
wordGroup: front fender 前叶子板，前护盖
rubber fender 橡皮挡泥板；橡胶防冲垫；橡胶护垫
fender bender 轻微交通事故；撞弯保险杠的车祸（等于小车祸）

sentences.en: I got a ding in my rear fender.
sentences.cn: 我汽车后面的挡泥板撞瘪了一处。

sentences.en: Todd sat on the front fender, his legs dangling toward the ground.
sentences.cn: 托德坐在前挡泥板上，双腿耷拉晃荡着。

sentences.en: Advance package models include further noise reduction using a thicker carpet base layer and front fender liners.
sentences.cn: 先进的包装模式包括进一步降低噪音使用更厚的地毯基层和前挡泥板衬垫。
